page.title: 17SHOPS,FACTORIES IN CIPPENHAM
page.content: In our area are 47 shops.They range from Butchers to Hi-fi shops.There are a new range of shops which opened in 1983.There is also a Super Market.The average hours of work a week is 9a.m - 5p.m. A few of the shops are family businesses. We interviewed Cordells.We only spoke to the stock control manageress.She said that the clothing factory has been there for 11 years.She has worked there 9 years.None of her relations have worked there.16 people work there. There is a factory called Cippenham Casting Co Ltd.It is just around the corner from our school.The person who helped us is called Mr.Painters.We asked him how long he had worked there?He said 38 years.There are 25 employees.They make Aluminium castings for cars and buses.
